name: Espresso
description: A concentrated coffee beverage brewed by forcing hot water through finely-ground coffee beans.

name: Cappuccino
description: An espresso-based coffee drink topped with steamed milk foam.

name: Latte
description: A coffee drink made with espresso and steamed milk.

name: French Press
description: A coffee brewing method that uses a plunger to separate the grounds from the liquid.

name: Cold Brew
description: A smooth coffee made by steeping coarsely ground coffee beans in cold water for an extended period.

name: Americano
description: A diluted espresso with hot water, resembling traditional drip coffee.

name: Mocha
description: A chocolate-flavored espresso drink with steamed milk and foam.

name: Macchiato
description: An espresso drink with a small amount of steamed milk or foam.

name: Turkish Coffee
description: A traditional method of brewing unfiltered coffee with finely ground coffee beans.

name: Affogato
description: A dessert coffee made by pouring a shot of hot espresso over a scoop of vanilla ice cream.
